description: Connect to the Algorithmia API to host language-agnostic functions and algorithms via an API. Test an API call and export the code snippet into your app.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Algorithmia

args.name: owner
args.info: Algorithm owner

args.name: algoname
args.info: Algorithm name

args.name: data
args.info: JSON objects

blocks.name: checkExistence
blocks.description: Check if directory or file exists without downloading it

args.name: apiKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Algorithmia

args.name: connector
args.info: The data source: data,dropbox,s3

args.name: name
args.info: File or directory

blocks.name: listDirectoryContents
blocks.description: List the contents of a directory

args.name: apiKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Algorithmia

args.name: connector
args.info: The data source: data,dropbox,s3

args.name: path
args.info: Directory (relative to the root of a given data source)

args.name: acl
args.info: Include the directory ACL in the response. (Default = false)

blocks.name: createDirectory
blocks.description: Create a directory through the Algorithmia Data API

args.name: apiKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Algorithmia

args.name: connector
args.info: The data source: data,dropbox,s3

args.name: path
args.info: Directory (relative to the root of a given data source)

args.name: name
args.info: Name of the directory to create

args.name: apiKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Algorithmia

args.name: connector
args.info: The data source: data,dropbox,s3

args.name: path
args.info: Directory (relative to the root of a given data source)

args.name: acl
args.info: JSON object specifying permissions of the directory

args.name: apiKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Algorithmia

args.name: connector
args.info: The data source: data,dropbox,s3

args.name: path
args.info: Directory (relative to the root of a given data source)

args.name: force
args.info: If true, enables recursive delete of a non-empty directory

blocks.name: getFile
blocks.description: Get a file through the Algorithmia Data API

args.name: apiKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Algorithmia

args.name: connector
args.info: The data source: data,dropbox,s3

args.name: path
args.info: File path (relative to the root of a given data source)

blocks.name: uploadFile
blocks.description: Upload a file through the Algorithmia Data API

args.name: apiKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Algorithmia

args.name: connector
args.info: The data source: data,dropbox,s3

args.name: path
args.info: Directory (relative to the root of a given data source)

args.name: file
args.info: Uploaded file

blocks.name: deleteFile
blocks.description: Delete a file through the Algorithmia Data API

args.name: apiKey
args.info: The api key obtained from Algorithmia

args.name: connector
args.info: The data source: data,dropbox,s3

args.name: path
args.info: File path (relative to the root of a given data source)
